items.content_html: A lightweight, open-source Google Apps Script that connects Google Sheets to Iterable’s API. Easily send data directly from Sheets to Iterable Catalogs — perfect for marketing, automation, and user management workflows. Simple to install, easy to customise, and built for community collaboration.
